page.title: 10Clubs Littlebourne Area
page.content: Littlebourne has its own WI which has its 40th anniversary in 1985. It has 60 members + has a Choir, Drama group Darts team + Country Dance group. Classes are held each year e.g. Glove making, Lampshades, Pewter work, Collage, Crochet Art. Each year there is a bazaar, the poppy collection, party for the aged. Ickham + W'breux share their WI + have a very active Drama group. Both L'bourne and W'breux have a Brownie pack and both "fly up " to The guides in L'bourne which have 25 members at present. They meet in the school but the scouts and cubs meet on Thursdays in the Hall. Other Clubs are L'bourne Youth club on Fridays, Coffee club on Mondays, Over Sixties on Thursdays, Playgroup in the mornings. Ickham and Wickhambreux each have a Produce Association which has a show during the summer.
